verses.ar: ٱقۡتَرَبَتِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ وَٱنشَقَّ ٱلۡقَمَرُ
verses.en: The Hour has come near, and the moon has split [in two]

verses.ar: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ ءَايَةٗ يُعۡرِضُواْ وَيَقُولُواْ سِحۡرٞ مُّسۡتَمِرّٞ
verses.en: And if they see a miracle, they turn away and say, "Passing magic

verses.ar: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ
verses.en: And they denied and followed their inclinations. But for every matter is a [time of] settlement

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَنۢبَآءِ مَا فِيهِ مُزۡدَجَرٌ
verses.en: And there has already come to them of information that in which there is deterrence

verses.ar: حِكۡمَةُۢ بَٰلِغَةٞۖ فَمَا تُغۡنِ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.en: Extensive wisdom - but warning does not avail [them]

verses.ar: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ نُّكُرٍ
verses.en: So leave them, [O Muhammad]. The Day the Caller calls to something forbidding

verses.ar: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ
verses.en: Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading

verses.ar: مُّهۡطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِۖ يَقُولُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا يَوۡمٌ عَسِرٞ
verses.en: Racing ahead toward the Caller. The disbelievers will say, "This is a difficult Day

verses.ar: ۞كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ فَكَذَّبُواْ عَبۡدَنَا وَقَالُواْ مَجۡنُونٞ وَٱزۡدُجِرَ
verses.en: The people of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant and said, "A madman," and he was repelled

verses.ar: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّي مَغۡلُوبٞ فَٱنتَصِرۡ
verses.en: So he invoked his Lord, "Indeed, I am overpowered, so help

verses.ar: فَفَتَحۡنَآ أَبۡوَٰبَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَآءٖ مُّنۡهَمِرٖ
verses.en: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down

verses.ar: وَفَجَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ عُيُونٗا فَٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرٖ قَدۡ قُدِرَ
verses.en: And caused the earth to burst with springs, and the waters met for a matter already predestined

verses.ar: وَحَمَلۡنَٰهُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلۡوَٰحٖ وَدُسُرٖ
verses.en: And We carried him on a [construction of] planks and nails

verses.ar: تَجۡرِي بِأَعۡيُنِنَا جَزَآءٗ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ
verses.en: Sailing under Our observation as reward for he who had been denied

verses.ar: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.en: And We left it as a sign, so is there any who will remember

verses.ar: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.en: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.en: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

verses.ar: كَذَّبَتۡ عَادٞ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.en: Aad denied; and how [severe] were My punishment and warning

verses.ar: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِيحٗا صَرۡصَرٗا فِي يَوۡمِ نَحۡسٖ مُّسۡتَمِرّٖ
verses.en: Indeed, We sent upon them a screaming wind on a day of continuous misfortune

verses.ar: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٖ مُّنقَعِرٖ
verses.en: Extracting the people as if they were trunks of palm trees uprooted

verses.ar: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.en: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.en: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

verses.ar: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.en: Thamud denied the warning

verses.ar: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَبَشَرٗا مِّنَّا وَٰحِدٗا نَّتَّبِعُهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّفِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٍ
verses.en: And said, "Is it one human being among us that we should follow? Indeed, we would then be in error and madness

verses.ar: أَءُلۡقِيَ ٱلذِّكۡرُ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۢ بَيۡنِنَا بَلۡ هُوَ كَذَّابٌ أَشِرٞ
verses.en: Has the message been sent down upon him from among us? Rather, he is an insolent liar

verses.ar: سَيَعۡلَمُونَ غَدٗا مَّنِ ٱلۡكَذَّابُ ٱلۡأَشِرُ
verses.en: They will know tomorrow who is the insolent liar

verses.ar: إِنَّا مُرۡسِلُواْ ٱلنَّاقَةِ فِتۡنَةٗ لَّهُمۡ فَٱرۡتَقِبۡهُمۡ وَٱصۡطَبِرۡ
verses.en: Indeed, We are sending the she-camel as trial for them, so watch them and be patient

verses.ar: وَنَبِّئۡهُمۡ أَنَّ ٱلۡمَآءَ قِسۡمَةُۢ بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلُّ شِرۡبٖ مُّحۡتَضَرٞ
verses.en: And inform them that the water is shared between them, each [day of] drink attended [by turn]

verses.ar: فَنَادَوۡاْ صَاحِبَهُمۡ فَتَعَاطَىٰ فَعَقَرَ
verses.en: But they called their companion, and he dared and hamstrung [her]

verses.ar: فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.en: And how [severe] were My punishment and warning

verses.ar: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَكَانُواْ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلۡمُحۡتَظِرِ
verses.en: Indeed, We sent upon them one blast from the sky, and they became like the dry twig fragments of an [animal] pen

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.en: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

verses.ar: كَذَّبَتۡ قَوۡمُ لُوطِۭ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.en: The people of Lot denied the warning

verses.ar: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَاصِبًا إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٖۖ نَّجَّيۡنَٰهُم بِسَحَرٖ
verses.en: Indeed, We sent upon them a storm of stones, except the family of Lot - We saved them before dawn

verses.ar: نِّعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَن شَكَرَ
verses.en: As favor from us. Thus do We reward he who is grateful

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ أَنذَرَهُم بَطۡشَتَنَا فَتَمَارَوۡاْ بِٱلنُّذُرِ
verses.en: And he had already warned them of Our assault, but they disputed the warning

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ رَٰوَدُوهُ عَن ضَيۡفِهِۦ فَطَمَسۡنَآ أَعۡيُنَهُمۡ فَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.en: And they had demanded from him his guests, but We obliterated their eyes, [saying], "Taste My punishment and warning

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ صَبَّحَهُم بُكۡرَةً عَذَابٞ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ
verses.en: And there came upon them by morning an abiding punishment

verses.ar: فَذُوقُواْ عَذَابِي وَنُذُرِ
verses.en: So taste My punishment and warning

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.en: And We have certainly made the Qur'an easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَ ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ ٱلنُّذُرُ
verses.en: And there certainly came to the people of Pharaoh warning

verses.ar: كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا كُلِّهَا فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُمۡ أَخۡذَ عَزِيزٖ مُّقۡتَدِرٍ
verses.en: They denied Our signs, all of them, so We seized them with a seizure of one Exalted in Might and Perfect in Ability

verses.ar: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.en: Are your disbelievers better than those [former ones], or have you immunity in the scripture

verses.ar: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ نَحۡنُ جَمِيعٞ مُّنتَصِرٞ
verses.en: Or do they say, "We are an assembly supporting [each other]

verses.ar: سَيُهۡزَمُ ٱلۡجَمۡعُ وَيُوَلُّونَ ٱلدُّبُرَ
verses.en: [Their] assembly will be defeated, and they will turn their backs [in retreat]

verses.ar: بَلِ ٱلسَّاعَةُ مَوۡعِدُهُمۡ وَٱلسَّاعَةُ أَدۡهَىٰ وَأَمَرُّ
verses.en: But the Hour is their appointment [for due punishment], and the Hour is more disastrous and more bitter

verses.ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ وَسُعُرٖ
verses.en: Indeed, the criminals are in error and madness

verses.ar: يَوۡمَ يُسۡحَبُونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ ذُوقُواْ مَسَّ سَقَرَ
verses.en: The Day they are dragged into the Fire on their faces [it will be said], "Taste the touch of Saqar

verses.ar: إِنَّا كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَٰهُ بِقَدَرٖ
verses.en: Indeed, all things We created with predestination

verses.ar: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ
verses.en: And Our command is but one, like a glance of the eye

verses.ar: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشۡيَاعَكُمۡ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ
verses.en: And We have already destroyed your kinds, so is there any who will remember

verses.ar: وَكُلُّ شَيۡءٖ فَعَلُوهُ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ
verses.en: And everything they did is in written records

verses.ar: وَكُلُّ صَغِيرٖ وَكَبِيرٖ مُّسۡتَطَرٌ
verses.en: And every small and great [thing] is inscribed

verses.ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ وَنَهَرٖ
verses.en: Indeed, the righteous will be among gardens and rivers

verses.ar: فِي مَقۡعَدِ صِدۡقٍ عِندَ مَلِيكٖ مُّقۡتَدِرِۭ
verses.en: In a seat of honor near a Sovereign, Perfect in Ability
